Feb. 15, 1976 D NWABBA Contest (Second Section)
NWABBA Contest (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest NWABBA Contest north-west-association-contest-second-section
Sinfonietta for Brass Band [Langford]
Bolton Town Hall, Bolton, Greater Manchester, England, UK Prizes - 1st £50 and cup, 2nd £30 and rose bowl, 3rd £20 and trophy. 6 bands competed.
Other Info gives a 6-points difference to 2nd placed band & George Thompson as an Adjudicator here - can that be confirmed?
